snippet.title: Lifeless Planet Review (Rant) - Is it Worth a Buy
snippet.description:
While seeking life on a distant planet, an astronaut discovers an abandoned Russian town. He suspects his mission is a hoax until a mysterious young woman saves him from a strange and deadly phenomenon... Lifeless Planet is a third-person action-adventure that features an old-school sci-fi story and spectacular environments in the spirit of classic action-adventures.  - But is it Worth a Buy?
